# tag-datepicker









## Demos









```html




<!-- dependencies -->




<link rel="stylesheet" href="/assets/kendo.common-bootstrap.min.css">




<link rel="stylesheet" href="/assets/kendo.bootstrap.min.css">




<script src="/assets/kendo.all.min.js"></script>









<tag-datepicker id="datedate"></tag-datepicker>




```









```html




<tag-datepicker id="effectiveFromDate" label="Effective from" class="wp__date"></tag-datepicker>




<tag-datepicker id="effectiveToDate" label="Effective to" class="wp__date"></tag-datepicker>




```
